title: Cat Count
description: A rhyming, cat-counting extravaganza, ending with a big surprise!"I have one cat,A fat cat, a fun cat.I have one cat . . .My sister has two."Young readers will chuckle with delight as they count the cats on each rhyming pageâ€”then, in both words and numerals, add their accumulated numbers at the end of the book.
author: Betsy Lewin
